thread.title: Liverpool transfer news: Julian Brandt wanted by Real Madrid as Jurgen Klopp risks losing out to Spanish giants this summer
thread.title_full: Liverpool transfer news: Julian Brandt wanted by Real Madrid as Jurgen Klopp risks losing out to Spanish giants this summer

author: achapman
title: Liverpool transfer news: Julian Brandt wanted by Real Madrid as Jurgen Klopp risks losing out to Spanish giants this summer
text:
EFL Jul In The Crown Liverpool transfer news: Julian Brandt wanted by Real Madrid as Jurgen Klopp risks losing out to Spanish giants this summer 
Anfield outfit keen to bring Bayer Leverkusen star to Premier League but face battle against Zinedine Zidane's riches By ANTHONY CHAPMAN Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LIVERPOOL are in danger of missing out on top target Julian Brandt after Real Madrid reportedly joined the race for his signature. 
The Bayer Leverkusen winger is one of German football’s top youngsters and has played a role in nine goals so far this season. Reuters 7 Liverpool face stiff competition in their hunt for Bayer Leverkusen ace Julian Brandt 
Ex- Borussia Dortmund boss Jurgen Klopp knows all about Brandt’s qualities after watching him emerge through the ranks at rivals Wolfsburg . Keep up to date with ALL the Liverpool news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
However, the Mail claims that Spanish giants Real Madrid are also in the mix after sending scouts to watch Brandt in action for Leverkusen last night. 
Jurgen Klopp is keen on bringing Brandt to Anfield this summer Sadio Mane hammers in two goals for Liverpool against Tottenham Reuters 
His side lost 4-2 in their Champions League last-16 first-leg clash against Atletico Madrid at home. 
But Brandt was one of the few Bayer players who shone and is believed to have impressed those who were watching. Related Articles Ozil BACK FOR KOP Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil currently carrying a back injury but should be fit for Liverpool clash KLOPP OUT Borussia Dortmund will beat Liverpool to teh signature of highly-rated Gladbach star Mahmoud Dahoud KLOPP REVOLUTION Liverpool set to transform Kirkby training academy facility with £50m revamp to help find next Steven Gerrard PREMIER IN Liverpool and Arsenal receive Joe Hart boost as Manchester City tell keeper he can join a Premier League rival Reuters The Germans lost 4-2 to Atletico Madrid in their Champions League last-16 first-leg tie Reuters 7 Liverpool are also interested in Leicester winger Demarai Gray 
However, Liverpool have other names on their shortlist and could end up making a move for Leicester ace Demarai Gray instead. 
Dortmund’s Christian Pulisic is another candidate but is sure to fetch a high price after bursting onto the scene in 2016. EPA Borussia Dortmund teen Christian Pulisic is another option for the Reds Getty Images 7 SunSport exclusively revealed that Chelsea striker Dominic Solanke is set for Liverpool 
As revealed by SunSport , one man who looks certain for a Merseyside switch is Chelsea youngster Dominic Solanke after being refused a new £50,000-a-week deal by the Premier League leaders.
